metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6345 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The function number_format is vulnerable to a heap overflow issue when itssecond argument ($dec_points) is excessively large. The internalimplementation of the function will cause a string to be created with aninvalid length, which can then interact poorly with other functions. Thisaffects all supported versions of HHVM (3.30.1 and 3.27.5 and below).

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
